data.title: Kisstory Science Theatre: KST's Xtreme Close Up Kommentary
data.meta_description: It's time to dig out your copy of 1992's "tell all" documentary and listen along as Adam and Des crack a few cold ones and struggle to stay on topic as they take a look through KISS' Xtreme Close Up.
data.text:
It's time to dig out your copy of 1992's "tell all" documentary and listen along as Adam and Des crack a few cold ones and struggle to stay on topic as they take a look through KISS' Xtreme Close Up.

Kisstory Science Theatre is three lifelong friends and KISS Army brothers who discuss everything you need to know about the hottest band in the world. Do they love it? Hate it? Don't sweat it, these three don't hold back on the ups and downs of the Gods of Thunder and Rock and Roll. Beer is often involved.
